drinks.name: Cappuccino
drinks.description: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a deep layer of foam.

drinks.name: Caffè Mocha
drinks.description: Espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, topped with sweetened whipped cream. Delightful.

drinks.name: Caramel Macchiato
drinks.description: Espresso combined with vanilla-flavoured syrup, milk and caramel sauce over ice. A Starbucks classic, chilled for a classic summer’s day. To our signature espresso we add a creamy mix of vanilla syrup and cold milk poured over ice; it’s then topped with our proprietary buttery caramel sauce. Sweet!

drinks.name: Caffè Americano
drinks.description: HOT: Rich, full-bodied espresso with hot water.

drinks.name: Espresso Con Panna
drinks.description: The delicate dollop of whipped cream softens the rich and caramelly espresso flavours so exquisitely, you may choose to forego adding sugar altogether.

drinks.name: Espresso Macchiato
drinks.description: Sometimes a touch is just enough. And so it is with the slight dab of foam we set atop our signature espresso in this classic European-style beverage.

drinks.name: Espresso
drinks.description: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk, lightly topped with foam. A caffè latte is simply a shot or two of bold, tasty espresso with fresh, sweet steamed milk over it.

drinks.name: Flat White
drinks.description: Expertly steamed milk poured over a double shot of our signature espresso and finished with a thin layer of velvety microfoam.

drinks.name: Asian Dolce Latte
drinks.description: Double-shots of the premium, dark-roasted Starbucks Espresso Roast, combine with the uniquely developed dolce sauce.

drinks.name: Cocoa Cappuccino
drinks.description: Double-shots of the premium, dark-roasted Starbucks Espresso Roast, combine with the uniquely developed dolce sauce.

drinks.name: Ristretto Bianco
drinks.description: Bold espresso and pure velvet texture. A product of simplicity, crafted into artistry, our baristas know that balance is key to the perfect Ristretto Bianco.

drinks.name: Iced Espresso & Matcha Fusion
drinks.description: We’ve combined our signature Espresso Roast with fine Matcha powder and milk to create the beautifully-layered Matcha & Espresso Fusion. Enjoy it hot and iced.

drinks.name: Double Shot Iced Shaken Espresso
drinks.description: Two fresh shots of espresso, hand shaken with classic syrup and ice, finished with low fat milk mixed with sweetened whipped cream.

drinks.name: Cold Foam
drinks.description: Slightly sweetened ice-cold espresso, poured through a distinct layer of surprisingly creamy, nonfat milk cold foam.

drinks.name: Freshly Brewed Coffee
drinks.description: Enjoy our rich, flavorful brewed coffees any time of day. Brewed perfectly for those who enjoy their coffee black, check in with our baristas on our selected brew of the day.

drinks.name: Misto
drinks.description: Equal parts fresh filter coffee and frothy steamed milk.

drinks.name: Cold Brew
drinks.description: Slow-steeped, small-batch and super smooth. To create our signature recipe, our team spent months experimenting with different brew times and coffee varietals. We specifically developed the Starbucks® Cold Brew Blend to heighten the rich, naturally sweet flavor created during the cold brewing process.

drinks.name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
drinks.description: Just before serving, our slow-steeped Cold Brew is topped with a delicate float of house-made vanilla sweet cream that cascades throughout the cup.

drinks.name: Green Tea Latte
drinks.description: Smooth and creamy matcha is lightly sweetened and served with steamed milk.

drinks.name: Chai Tea Latte
drinks.description: A less-sweet take on our beloved Classic Chai Tea Latte. Black tea--infused with cinnamon, clove and other warming spices--is steamed with milk and sweetened with liquid cane sugar.
